title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters 
**UPDATE: WE ARE SO BACK!** The Parthenon website is now showing live quest feeds again and you can check your progress, which will show all completed quests done before and even during that down time.

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters ~~If you get an error that "No quests found" just **log out of our testnet site** and you'll be able to see them again (don't worry, your progress is safe and will be counted even if you complete the quests while logged out 🤝). If you still don't see the quests when logged our, try a hard refresh (ctrl+shift+R).~~

**UPDATE:** Quests should now be loading for you whether logged in and logged out!

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters See news about our massive wallet update to make your life easier at https://discord.com/channels/1101576619493167217/1101576620160065680/1269150501513986050

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters Just an FYI, we'll be announcing more details about how you will **get your Resources for all the great work you've been doing** but we have some other things cooking for this, so there is currently no snapshot or date for them yet. So basically, don't worry, just keep doing your thing. I will give you lots of lead time to understand when/how they are rewarded so you have time to plan your strategy 🤝 :peace: :move1: 

Remember, all you need to do is complete 10% of quests in one single guild to be recongized in the program. (Not a bad idea to do more than that, but nobody is expecting you to get all quests in all Guilds!)

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters ~~Our **Sui devnet is down for maintanence for the next 12 hours** so apps like Xebra and Interest Protocol will not work during that time and your Sui wallets will not show tokens. **This is normal and just part of the devnet process** so hang out on our Aptos move apps instead and you can go back to Sui move tomorrow 🤝 ~~

Sui Devnet fully up and running strong!

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters ~~Our EVM devnet is experiencing high demand. **YOU DEGENS ARE BREAKING THE CHAIN!!!** :pepelmfa: :AAAAAAAA_1: :angry_moveus:  This is normal for a devent and part of optimizing these blockchains for primetime. So if **StableJack, Warpgate, and Overlay and other EVM apps** are slow or not working, that's why. We'll update when the network livens up soon.~~

EVM Devnet got a big memory boost. You should see your performance on EVM apps much improved!

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters Here's a helpful guide showing which apps are on which Movement Network: https://movementlabs.notion.site/The-Mother-Of-All-Testnet-App-Guides-MOATAG-c9b85e1023414344ac68716875f413ee

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters here are some testnet updates:

👉 **UPDATE: Movement Sui network is back up!** 
~~The **Movement Sui devnet is currently down**, so Sui faucet and Sui Move apps like Xebra and Interest Protocol are not currently working~~

👉 **MovePosition Spartan Quests** have been *temporarily* taken off the site while we wait for network upgrades. Any progress you made on their quests is safe and will be back up soon.

👉 You may notice transactions failing on our testnet or completed Galxe quests not showing up on our Parthenon site or an empty Progress Bar on the Parthenon site.
-  **Don't worry, all your quests are safe!**
- These are due to the **tremendous amount of activity by all you degens on our network and on Galxe!!!** (12.8 **MILLLION** transactions this last week)
- Planned testnet upgrades are scheduled as we test the testnet that will allow more transactions and we're working closely with the Galxe team to improve the refresh rate of our website.

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters We're still seeing issues with claiming on-chain quests in Galxe, especially for apps on the Movement EVM network (like StableJack, Avitus, BRKT, Overlay, Warpgate, etc). **Don't worry! We're still recording your actions on chain and soon you'll be able to claim again in Galxe. Your progress is safe.** ~~Our EVM faucet is also down at the moment but should be back up soon~~. **Thanks for your patience!**

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters **Our EVM faucet is working again!** ~~Quests for Movement EVM projects are still not validating on Galxe, but a solution has been identified and should be fixed and ready to claim soon! Will update you here when all is working again.~~

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters **We are happy to report that Galxe quest verification is working again now!** Please go back and claim the tasks/quests that you have already done and get credit on the Parthenon site! If you are still experiencing any issues with quest claiming, please let us know in #❓┃testnet-feedback

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters FYI, Galxe is moving their loyalty point claims on chain. After this occurs, when you want to claim a quest and get your loyalty points, you will be prompted to sign a transaction using your *Primary* EVM address. There is technically a gas fee for this, but **Galxe is waiving all fees** for Movement and all associated projects on the testnet so you will not need gas tokens or need to pay any fees. In summary, nothing should change for you except you need to sign a transaction after you click the claim button. 

**JUST REMEMBER THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH OUR PARTHENON QUESTS OR YOUR PROGRESS!** This is just an update on the Galxe site with the way they have people claim quests. Your completed quests on this site are what matters for our community recognition!

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters ~~Echelon and Meridian have identified the issue for why their quests are not verifying in Galxe and it should be fixed be tomorrow. In the meantime, you can continue to do the quests on their sites and then we'll ping you when each of them becomes available to claim on Galxe 🤝 Remember, no rush, plenty of time, your onchain activity is safu.~~ **UPDATE: Echelon and Meridian quests are claimable now!**

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters **Our Movement EVM network is getting crushed by so many people using it! **You guys are breaking the chain!!! But I know this makes it frustrating to use EVM apps like StableJack, Avitus, Warpgate, BRKT, Stream and others... But don't worry, those apps are great, it's just the network that is bogged down. This is part of the testnet process and our engineers are working steadily on performance updates. We'll keep you updated here!

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters ~~**BE AWARE:** The discord of one of the projects in our testnet program, **Nexio**, has been hacked. **Do not click on any links in their server!**~~ The Nexio server has been restored and all appears safe for now. A reminder to never click links if they seem too good to be true... https://x.com/ethicstweets/status/1826941300521758852

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters We have some exciting new features coming to the Parthenon site! But before we roll them out we need to fix a problem with the way we have been counting your completed quests.

The Parthenon site has been marking a Quest completed on our site if the *tasks* are done in Galxe rather than if the quest has been *claimed* in Galxe. Subtle difference but we need to get it corrected for the next cool things coming.

The bad news is that for some of you, it may *appear* that you have lost credit for come Quests. However, **all your work and progress is safe!**

**Here's what ya need to do:**
1️⃣ Look for Quests that say **"Pending Claim"** in the upper right-hand corner
2️⃣ **Click** on that Quest to go to it's page in Galxe
3️⃣ **Claim the quest** in Galxe
4️⃣** Refresh your Quest section** on the Parthenon Site. Your Quest should be green again.

**MAKE QUESTS GREEN AGAIN!**

If you have *any* questions please let us know in #❓┃testnet-feedback but again just want to reassure you that **all your progress is safe and still counts!** You just need to claim and all will be well.

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: To check if you have any missing quests that need to be claimed, **just select the "Claim Pending" box** in the sidebar of the Quest page. I have like 30 quests to claim, so I'm glad our web devs added this filter! 😅 :keklaugh:

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters We're working on bringing some new features to our Parthenon site~~ so **the site is currently down for maintenance**.~~ The site is live again!

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters The Parthenon site is experiencing *very heavy traffic* and is currently down but not to worry, **all your progress is safe** and we're working on a fix. Will update you asap!

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters Still waiting on the site to recover from the incredible demand! Our engineers are being infused **pure, uncut Potassium** :angry_moveus::petbanana:   to aid them in beefing up the servers.

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
gmove @Testnetters! We're making progress on our testnet site! For the time being you cannot log into the site via Galxe, but not to worry. **Any progress you make on Quests is being recorded and will be reflected when you are able to log in again.**

**If your progress bar appears empty, don't worry;** it's only because you're not currently logged into our site. All progress is safe and will appear again when the full site functions are resumed. 🤝

For now a general list of all quests is available at https://testnet.movementlabs.xyz/quests

Thanks for your patience! Almost there... and then we'll be able to show you our brand new feature:
**The Paths of the Guilds** :poggers: 
||@Study. Battle. Build. @Building The Parthenon ||

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html: @Testnetters @Study. Battle. Build. @Building The Parthenon **WE ARE SO BACK!** The Parthenon Testnet site is fully operational! **Thanks for your patience** and thanks to our devs for helping it be able to handle all you degens workin' the testnet! :pepelmfa: :lightning: :AAAAAAAA_1:

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters **Our Parthenon Testnet site is down at the moment.** 😭  But **progress is safe** and work on Galxe quests will be reflected when we come back up!

You can find links to participating Galxe spaces to work on in the meantime here: https://testnet.movementlabs.xyz/apps (or in this cool list compiled by @CodeGlitch https://github.com/CodeGlitch/movement-galxe-compilation)

**All progress will be reflected when our site comes back up!** :AAAAAAAA_1: :lightning: :peace: 

If you're just joining us, check out:
👉 #🤝┃start-here 
👉 #🏛┃testnet-guide

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters Currently there are some issues with the Parthenon site preventing claiming of the @Spartans Recruit role. Not to worry, this will be fixed soon and you'll be able to get your role! **UPDATE:** Most of you should be able to claim soon after you log back into the site (as your cache is updated!)

In the meantime, **big updates coming up**:
- Step One of the Paths for other Guilds
- Step Two of the Paths for Spartans
- And the **||Leaderboard goes live!||**

title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-news
html:
@Testnetters In case you heard otherwise, **no official end date to our Testnet experience has been announced yet.** We have *at least* another month left. Happy questing! 🤝

If you are *still not sure* if Testnet has ended, you can check at #wen
